label: Behavior 62674721
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving south-southeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 54.9123 - 0.00048 × t, lon(t) ≈ 7.4869 + 0.00009 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
description: Speed profile: stable (the vessel maintains a nearly constant speed, with SOG varying only slightly between 12.0 and 13.4 knots across the segment)
Course change: gradual and consistent (COG shows a slow, steady progression around 174°, with minor fluctuations between 173° and 176°, indicating a smooth directional trend)
Heading fluctuation: gradual and consistent (heading remains fixed at 175.0° throughout the sequence, showing no abrupt changes or oscillations)

Behavior intent: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving south-southeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 54.9123 - 0.00048 × t, lon(t) ≈ 7.4869 + 0.00009 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
